original: intros f y b a cont_f y_bound. assert (Hbound: Rmin (f a) (f b) <= y <= Rmax (f a) (f b)) by auto. pose proof (MVT_abs f (fun x => derivable_continuous_pt f x) a b) as Hmvt. specialize (Hmvt (fun c => Rmin a b <= c <= Rmax a b -> derivable_pt_lim f c (fun x => f x))). specialize (Hmvt (fun c => Rmin a b <= c <= Rmax a b)). assert (Hexists: exists c : R, Rabs (f b - f a) = Rabs (f c) * Rabs (b - a) /\ Rmin a b <= c <= Rmax a b) by apply Hmvt. destruct Hexists as [c [Hc1 Hc2]]. exists c. split; auto.
